 * OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE
 * OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
 */

/**
 * Thrown by abstract methods and classes
 */
export class AbstractError extends Error {}

/**
 * Thrown upon invocation of an abstract class
 */
export class AbstractClassError extends AbstractError {
  constructor() {
    super('Can not make an instance of an abstract class');
  }
}

/**
 * Thrown upon invocation of an abstract method
 */
export class AbstractMethodError extends AbstractError {
  constructor() {
    super('Can not call an abstract method');
  }
}

 * SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER
 * CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY,
 * OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE
 * OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
 */

export default class Singleton {
  constructor() {
    if (!this.constructor.instance) {
      this.constructor.instance = this;
      this._instanceCount = 0;
    }

    this._instanceCount++;

    return this.constructor.instance;
  }
}

 * CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY,
 * OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE
 * OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
 */

/**
 * Converts snake_case strings to camelCase
 * @param {String} str - a snake_case string
 * @returns {String} - Converted camelCase string
 * @private
 */
export function snakeToCamelCase(str) {
  return str.replace(/(?:(_[a-z\d]))/g, x => x[1].toUpperCase());
}

/**
 * Converts camelCase strings to snake_case
 * @param {String} str - a camelCase string
 * @returns {String} - Converted snake_case string
 * @private
 */
export function camelToSnakeCase(str) {
  return str.replace(/([A-Z])/g, x => '_' + x.toLowerCase());
}

/**
 * Converts PascalCase strings to camelCase
 * @param {String} str - a PascalCase string
 * @returns {String} - Converted camelCase string
 * @private
 */
export function pascalToCamelCase(str) {
  return str.replace(/^([A-Z])/g, x => x.toLowerCase());
}

 * SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER
 * CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY,
 * OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE
 * OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
 */

import {encodeQueryString} from './requests';

const FNV1_32A_INIT = 0x811c9dc5;

/**
 * Fast hash function for non-cryptographic use
 * @param {string} str - Input to be hashed
 * @returns {string} - String representation of the hash
 * @private
 */
export function fnv32a(str) {
  const hash = str
    .split('')
    .map(x => x.charCodeAt(0))
    .reduce((sum, val) => {
      sum ^= val;
      return sum + (sum << 1) + (sum << 4) + (sum << 7) + (sum << 8) + (sum << 24);
    }, FNV1_32A_INIT);

  return ('0000000' + (hash >>> 0).toString(16)).substr(-8);
}

/**
 * Fast object hashing for non-cryptographic use
 * @param {object} data - input data
 * @returns {string} - String reprisentation of the hash
 * @private
 */
export function hashObject(data) {
  return fnv32a(encodeQueryString(data));
}

 * @returns {boolean} - Is the application running under node?

 * @private
 */
export function isNode() {
  return typeof window === 'undefined' && typeof module !== 'undefined' && module.exports;
}
